definition: to fill/to satisfy/to fulfill/to act in place of/substitute/sufficient/full
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Based on the above, the four-stage charging program is got.
sentences.chinese: 由此得出本充电器所采用的四阶段充电方案。

sentences.english: Each came equipped with a charger that plugs into an electrical outlet.
sentences.chinese: 每一个机件都装有一个可插入电源插口的充电器。

sentences.english: Pick up a battery recharger and an extra set of NiMH batteries.
sentences.chinese: 最好挑选一个电池充电器和一套特优的镍氢电池组。

sentences.english: It is normal for the charger to put in a small amount of charge to fully charged batteries.
sentences.chinese: 充电器给满电电池充进一点是很正常的。

sentences.english: So laughter can be like a “quick-charge” for our brain’s batteries. Laugh more, and laugh harder.
sentences.chinese: 故而笑能像我们大脑电池的一个“快速充电器”。

sentences.english: This thesis presents a novel zero-current-transition (ZCT) pulse-width-modulation(PWM) dc-dc converter for battery chargers.
sentences.chinese: 本論文提出一零电流转移脉波宽度调变蓄电池充电器。

sentences.english: Duracell is also innovating, including a battery charger that works in a car.
sentences.chinese: 金霸王正在谋求革新，比如开发车载电池充电器。

sentences.english: Also shown are spare props, the flight battery, and charger.
sentences.chinese: 还示出了备用的道具的飞行电池，和充电器。

sentences.english: However, many people always keep their recharger plugged in.
sentences.chinese: 所以许多人经常将充电器插在插座上。

sentences.english: It has its own battery charger.
sentences.chinese: 它有自己的干电池充电器。

sentences.english: The women learn to build and maintain a variety of solar-powered lamps and chargers.
sentences.chinese: 妇女们学着如何建成以及维护一些太阳能灯和充电器。

sentences.english: But I've cut my chargers down to the bare minimum.
sentences.chinese: 但是我把携带的充电器的数量和体积减少到了极限。

sentences.english: One kind of electric automobile intelligence fleetness charger design process the main body of a book has been introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了一种电动汽车智能快速充电器的设计过程。

sentences.english: You'd never need to hunt for the right charger again.
sentences.chinese: 再也不用为充电器踏破铁鞋了。

sentences.english: We have had a case, charger cables, screen protectors, headphones, "and" car.
sentences.chinese: 我们进行案例，充电器电缆，屏幕保护贴，耳机，车。

sentences.english: Comes with a car charger and an aftermarket home charger.
sentences.chinese: 伴随着汽车充电器和一个售后家充电器。
